page.title: 18Bubbenhall:The School
page.content: Bubbenhall C of E Primary School was built in 1864.It is a small school just off the Leamington Spa to Rugby road.The school holds 31 children,with the ages ranging from 4_8 years.There are two classes in the school ,taught by a teacher and the headmistress,Miss Baber.This small school has facilities for hot meals,together with toilets and games equipment.The children have one large playground with a climbing frame.This is also where P.E.lessons are held.There is not much other ground available,so the children use the recreation ground for games.School times are from 08.50 to 15.15,with a morning and afternoon break as well.There is a pleasant,friendly atmosphere throughout the school.Due to its size,curricular opportunities are restricted by staff available.
